nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 11 is the eleventh issue of the comic book series Star Wars Adventures. It includes the stories "Powered Down, Part II" and "Tales from Wild Space: Family Affair, Part 2," which conclude the stories started in the previous issue. Adventures 11 was released by IDW Publishing on June 6, 2018.

"Powered Down," Part 2 (of 2). Han and Chewie are stuck on an alien planet with no way off while being pursued by droids bent on their destruction! Will everyone's favorite smuggler duo find a way to safety before time runs out?
